contentencoded:
Japan has given the green light to Boeing's 787 Dreamliner. Japans two biggest airlines, Nippon Airways and Japan Airlines, may resume flying the aircraft, which has been grounded since January. 

The BBC's Rupert Wingfield-Hayes joins Marketplace Morning Report host Jeremy Hobson from Tokyo with the latest.
description: Japan has given the green light to Boeing's 787 Dreamliner. Japans two biggest airlines, Nippon Airways and Japan Airlines, may resume flying the aircraft, which has been grounded since January.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, April 26, 2013
